duties_responsibilities.duty: Strengthen existing OEM/VAR partnerships through account management, technical support, and pricing/product announcements.
Explore and foster new OEM/VAR partnerships and establish a professional level of support.
Contribute to the growth strategy through sales enablement, consulting, training, and customer service for hardware and software offerings.
Collaborate with the Emerging Business Team to align on Life Science Industrialization (LSI) goals.
Construct partnership models for low-risk explorations of new markets in their early stages.

education_certification.credential: PhD or higher in Life/Physical Sciences, or Materials Sciences with experience in microscopy, imaging, and lab automation
